title: Treat a loved one to a lifetime of language learning and skill building with this $190 bundle
content:
Macworld

Have a loved one whose mind is always racing to learn new things? This Valentine’s Day, consider giving them the gift of lifetime knowledge with this bundle featuring Rosetta Stone and StackSkills Unlimited.

This lifetime learning bundle can open new horizons by combining two invaluable knowledge resources. Just enter code ROSETTA to grab it for only $169.97 (reg. $849) through February 4.

Rosetta Stone has been trusted for decades, offering immersive and intuitive language learning for 25 different languages. Learn conversational skills and vocabulary like how you learned as a child, and improve your accent with Rosetta Stone’s proprietary speech recognition technology, TruAccent™. Your special person will have lifetime access to Rosetta Stone, meaning they can review lessons or go back and learn another language or two.

The other half of the bundle is StackSkills Unlimited. With over 1,000 courses available and 50 new classes added monthly, your loved one can learn almost any topic, whether that’s finance, marketing, or growth hacking, and even earn course certifications for their studying. Users will learn from more than 350 of the web’s top instructors and enjoy quarterly Q&A sessions.

You have until February 4 at 11:59 p.m. PT to get your Valentine a lifetime subscription to Rosetta Stone and StackSkills Unlimited for just $169.97 with code ROSETTA.
